document.full_text: nearly three of five children with newly diagnosed epilepsy do not take their antiepileptic medications as prescribed over the first six months of therapy, u.s. researchers said on tuesday.
document.title: missed or late medicine doses common in epileptic kids
lines_and_colors: nearly three of five children with newly diagnosed epilepsy do not take their antiepileptic medications as prescribed over the first six months of therapy, u.s. researchers said on tuesday.
